name: Unit➇
detail: Unit➇ was founded in 2017 as a division of Ape Unit, to explore new solutions through decentralized technologies. We share this exploration at the intersection of strategy, design, and development with collaboration partners such asEthereum, Tezos, NEAR, Celo, Algorand, andCosmos.

name: Unit A
detail: Unit A is A joint-force between African & European developers & organizations working in blockchain technology

name: A-Task
detail: A-task is a user-friendly project management tool that streamlines daily tasks for greater productivity. It's an open-source platform that accepts issues and pull requests for continuous development. With its sleek interface, A-task is perfect for busy individuals at work or in their personal lives.

name: CMS
detail: Say goodbye to manual and disorganized financial processes, and hello to a smarter, more efficient way of managing church finances with our innovative website, accessible only to trusted members.

name: SmartShop
detail: SmartShop is a leading online marketplace that streamlines the shopping process and provides customers with a seamless and hassle-free way to purchase anything they desire, right at their fingertips.

name: Akagera Aviation
detail: Booking.AkageraAviation is a user-friendly platform that enables residents of Rwanda to easily book their flight tickets within the country with just a few clicks.
